name: Nin9
description:
The control's are very simple, use the keyboards arrows or WASD to move around the map.

If you need to get a rest, you are able to!, go to the main menu, just push ESC to do it. The game save itself automatically, you won't lose your game, you will continuo at the same level you left. If you want to restart, you can push "reset" button to reset your game

Actually the game has 9 levels, their going from "completely in peace" to "what crazy thing is this?!?" enjoy it.

Credits

Music: Eyes in the Dark from Pico-8 Tunes Vol. 2 by Gruber

Design and development: AnNoviceIndie
